```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(flexdashboard)
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(DT)

# Load geojson of LA County watersheds
watersheds <- geojsonio::geojson_read("json/watersheds.json", what = "sp")

# Create a color palette 'pal' for factor
pal <- colorFactor(palette = c("#1F77B4",  "#AEC7E8", "#FF7F0E", "#FFBB78", 
                               "#2CA02C", "#98DF8A", "#D62728", "#FF9896", 
                               "#9467BD", "#C5B0D5", "#8C564B", "#C49C94", 
                               "#E377C2", "#F7B6D2", "#7F7F7F", "#C7C7C7", 
                               "#BCBD22", "#DBDB8D", "#17BECF", "#9EDAE5"), 
                   domain = NULL)

```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Map

```{r}
leaflet::leaflet() %>%
  leaflet::addTiles() %>%
  leaflet::setView(-118.2437, 34.0522, zoom = 8) %>%
  leaflet::addPolygons(data=watersheds, stroke = TRUE, weight = 0.25, smoothFactor = 0.5, fillOpacity = 0.35,
              fillColor = ~pal(NAME), 
              popup = ~paste("", NAME, "", ""))
```
